verses.verse: Then Elihu <S%H453><s%> continued <S%H3254><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%>
"Wait <S%H3803><s%> for me a little, <S%H2191><s%> and I will show <S%H2331><s%> you That there is yet <S%H5750><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> to be said <S%H4405><s%> in God's behalf.
"I will fetch <S%H5375><s%> my knowledge <S%H1843><s%> from afar, <S%H7350><s%> And I will ascribe <S%H5414><s%> righteousness <S%H6664><s%> to my Maker. <S%H6466><s%>
"For truly <S%H551><s%> my words <S%H4405><s%> are not false; <S%H8267><s%> One who <S%H8549><s%> is perfect <S%H8549><s%> in knowledge <S%H1844><s%> is with you.
"Behold, <S%H2005><s%> God <S%H410><s%> is mighty <S%H3524><s%> but does not despise <S%H3988><s%> [any;] [He is] mighty <S%H3524><s%> in strength <S%H3581><s%> of understanding. <S%H3820><s%>
"He does not keep <S%H2421><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> alive, <S%H2421><s%> But gives <S%H5414><s%> justice <S%H4941><s%> to the afflicted. <S%H6041><s%>

"He does not withdraw <S%H1639><s%> His eyes <S%H5869><s%> from the righteous; <S%H6662><s%> But with kings <S%H4428><s%> on the throne <S%H3678><s%> He has seated <S%H3427><s%> them forever, <S%H5331><s%> and they are exalted. <S%H1361><s%>
"And if <S%H518><s%> they are bound <S%H631><s%> in fetters, <S%H9108><s%> And are caught <S%H3920><s%> in the cords <S%H9112><s%> of affliction, <S%H6040><s%>
Then He declares <S%H5046><s%> to them their work <S%H6467><s%> And their transgressions, <S%H6588><s%> that they have magnified <S%H1396><s%> themselves.
"And He opens <S%H1540><s%> their ear <S%H241><s%> to instruction, <S%H4148><s%> And commands <S%H559><s%> that they return <S%H7725><s%> from evil. <S%H205><s%>

"If <S%H518><s%> they hear <S%H8085><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> [Him,] They shall end <S%H3615><s%> their days <S%H3117><s%> in prosperity, <S%H9185><s%> And their years <S%H8141><s%> in pleasures. <S%H5273><s%>
"But if <S%H518><s%> they do not hear, <S%H8085><s%> they shall perish <S%H5674><s%> by the sword, <S%H2719><s%> And they shall die <S%H1478><s%> without <S%H1097><s%> knowledge. <S%H1847><s%>
"But the godless <S%H2611><s%> in heart <S%H3820><s%> lay <S%H7760><s%> up anger; <S%H639><s%> They do not cry <S%H7768><s%> for help <S%H7768><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> He binds <S%H631><s%> them.
"They die <S%H4191><s%> in youth, <S%H5290><s%> And their life <S%H9130><s%> [perishes] among the cult <S%H6945><s%> prostitutes. <S%H6945><s%>
"He delivers <S%H2502><s%> the afflicted <S%H6041><s%> in their affliction, <S%H6040><s%> And opens <S%H1540><s%> their ear <S%H241><s%> in [time of] oppression. <S%H3906><s%>

"Then indeed, <S%H637><s%> He enticed <S%H5496><s%> you from the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of distress, <S%H9496><s%> Instead <S%H8478><s%> of it, a broad <S%H7338><s%> place <S%H7338><s%> with no <S%H3808><s%> constraint; <S%H4164><s%> And that which <S%H5183><s%> was set <S%H5183><s%> on your table <S%H7979><s%> was full <S%H4390><s%> of fatness. <S%H1880><s%>
"But you were full <S%H4390><s%> of judgment <S%H1779><s%> on the wicked; <S%H7563><s%> Judgment <S%H1779><s%> and justice <S%H4941><s%> take <S%H8551><s%> hold <S%H8551><s%> [of you.]

"[Beware] lest <S%H6435><s%> wrath <S%H2534><s%> entice <S%H5496><s%> you to scoffing; <S%H5607><s%> And do not let the greatness <S%H7230><s%> of the ransom <S%H3724><s%> turn <S%H5186><s%> you aside. <S%H5186><s%>
"Will your riches <S%H9592><s%> keep <S%H6186><s%> [you] from distress, <S%H9496><s%> Or all <S%H3605><s%> the forces <S%H3981><s%> of [your] strength <S%H3581><s%>?
"Do not long <S%H7602><s%> for the night, <S%H3915><s%> When people <S%H5971><s%> vanish <S%H5927><s%> in their place. <S%H8478><s%>
"Be careful, <S%H8104><s%> do not turn <S%H6437><s%> to evil; <S%H205><s%> For you have preferred <S%H977><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> to affliction. <S%H6040><s%>
"Behold, <S%H2005><s%> God <S%H410><s%> is exalted <S%H7682><s%> in His power; <S%H3581><s%> Who <S%H4310><s%> is a teacher <S%H4175><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> Him?
"Who <S%H4310><s%> has appointed <S%H6485><s%> Him His way, <S%H1870><s%> And who <S%H4310><s%> has said, <S%H559><s%> 'Thou hast done <S%H6466><s%> wrong <S%H9390><s%>'?
"Remember <S%H2142><s%> that you should exalt <S%H7679><s%> His work, <S%H6467><s%> Of which <S%H834><s%> men <S%H376><s%> have sung. <S%H7891><s%>
"All <S%H3605><s%> men <S%H120><s%> have seen <S%H2372><s%> it; Man <S%H120><s%> beholds <S%H5027><s%> from afar. <S%H7350><s%>

"Behold, <S%H2005><s%> God <S%H410><s%> is exalted, <S%H7689><s%> and we do not know <S%H3045><s%> [Him;] The number <S%H4557><s%> of His years <S%H8141><s%> is unsearchable. <S%H3808><s%> <S%H2714><s%>
"For He draws <S%H1639><s%> up the drops <S%H9325><s%> of water, <S%H4325><s%> They distill <S%H2212><s%> rain <S%H4306><s%> from the mist, <S%H108><s%>
Which <S%H834><s%> the clouds <S%H7834><s%> pour <S%H5140><s%> down, <S%H5140><s%> They drip <S%H7491><s%> upon man <S%H120><s%> abundantly. <S%H7227><s%>
"Can anyone understand <S%H995><s%> the spreading <S%H4666><s%> of the clouds, <S%H5645><s%> The thundering <S%H8663><s%> of His pavilion <S%H5521><s%>?
"Behold, <S%H2005><s%> He spreads <S%H6566><s%> His lightning <S%H216><s%> about <S%H5921><s%> Him, And He covers <S%H3680><s%> the depths <S%H8328><s%> of the sea. <S%H3220><s%>
"For by these He judges <S%H1777><s%> peoples; <S%H5971><s%> He gives <S%H5414><s%> food <S%H400><s%> in abundance. <S%H3527><s%>
"He covers <S%H3680><s%> [His] hands <S%H3709><s%> with the lightning, <S%H216><s%> And commands <S%H6680><s%> it to strike <S%H6293><s%> the mark. <S%H6293><s%>
"Its noise <S%H7452><s%> declares <S%H5046><s%> His presence; <S%H5921><s%> The cattle <S%H4735><s%> also, <S%H637><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> what is coming <S%H5927><s%> up.
